title: Buff Headwear Headband Botanic
description: The Headband Buff is a quick and easy application to keep sweat and hair out of your face and eyes. With its four-channel wicking fibers, CoolMax Extreme fabric makes a great helmet liner and sweatband that will keep you cool and dry in hot months and can be slid over your ears in colder months for thermal protection.
